statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_components;
SELECT component_name, component_type, quantity FROM renewable_energy_components;
SELECT id, supplier_name, price FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE supplier_name = 'Green Energy Co.';
SELECT id, component_name, price FROM renewable_energy_components ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT id, component_name, component_type FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(price) as total_price FROM renewable_energy_components GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_price > 5000
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE component_type = 'Solar Panels' OR component_type = 'Wind Turbines' ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT component_name, price, supplier_name FROM renewable_energy_components WHERE quantity >= 100 AND supplier_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, brand, power_output, price, quantity FROM solar_panels;
SELECT id, brand, price, power_output, quantity FROM solar_panels;
SELECT brand, price, power_output, quantity, id FROM solar_panels;
SELECT price, id, quantity, brand, power_output FROM solar_panels;
SELECT brand, power_output, id, price, quantity FROM solar_panels;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT brand, power_output FROM solar_panels WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY power_output DESC
SELECT brand, price FROM batteries WHERE capacity >= 5000 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT id, brand, quantity FROM solar_panels WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_price FROM batteries
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE wattage > 100
SELECT brand, quantity FROM solar_panels ORDER BY brand DESC
SELECT * FROM batteries WHERE capacity < 500
SELECT id, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT brand, voltage FROM batteries WHERE brand = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT brand, wattage FROM solar_panels WHERE wattage > 300 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT id, brand, capacity FROM batteries WHERE brand = 'Tesla' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Warehouse%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE wattage > 200 AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY brand;
SELECT brand, wattage, quantity FROM solar_panels JOIN inventory ON solar_panels.id = inventory.product_id WHERE inventory.quantity > 5 ORDER BY wattage DESC
SELECT id, brand, wattage, price FROM SolarPanels WHERE wattage > 300;
SELECT * FROM Batteries WHERE price < 500.00 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT brand, price FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT id, supplier, cost FROM Procurement WHERE cost BETWEEN 100.00 AND 200.00 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels JOIN Batteries ON SolarPanels.id = Batteries.id WHERE SolarPanels.wattage < 400;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE wattage > 300 ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT brand, wattage, price FROM SolarPanels WHERE price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT brand, wattage, price FROM SolarPanels JOIN Batteries ON SolarPanels.wattage = Batteries.capacity;
SELECT Inventory.location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY location HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT Procurement.supplier, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM Procurement GROUP BY supplier ORDER BY avg_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT id, brand, capacity FROM batteries;
SELECT id, brand, price FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM procurement ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM procurement GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE brand = 'SunPower';
SELECT id, brand, price FROM batteries WHERE type = 'Lithium-ion' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT suppliers.name, suppliers.address, procurement.quantity FROM suppliers JOIN procurement ON suppliers.id = procurement.supplier_id WHERE procurement.cost > 5000;
SELECT brand, capacity, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE capacity > 300 AND efficiency > 0.18;
SELECT inventory.location, inventory.quantity, components.brand FROM inventory JOIN components ON inventory.component_id = components.id WHERE components.type = 'battery';
